titles.title: I Know I Love Thee Better Lord (little work ni

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The half has never yet been told (yet been told) Of love so full and free The half has never yet been told (yet been told) The blood it cleanseth me (cleanseth me){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know I love Thee better Lord Than any earthly joy For Thou hast given me the peace Which nothing can destroy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know that Thou art nearer still Than any earthly throng And sweeter is the thought of Thee Than any lovely song{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou hast put gladness in my heart Then may I well be glad Without the secret of Thy love I could not but be sad{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Savior precious Savior mine What will Thy presence be If such a life of joy can crown Our walk on earth with Thee{/lang-eng}
